ComicInfo.Series: Doctor Who: The Tenth Doctor Archives
ComicInfo.Summary:
Stranded in a strange Museum that's dedicated to him - and with no TARDIS in sight, the Doctor and Martha must make sence of their surroundings, hindered by one small fact - the Doctor has lost the memories of every one of his previous incarnations! With items relevant to each Doctor in their posession, the Doctor must try to use them to regain his memories before it's too late, starting with his earliest incarnation's memories, involving Susan, Barbara and Ian. This all-new sereis written by Tony Lee (Starship Troopers) features artist Pia Guerra in her first monthly comic since 'Y The Last Man'!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/doctor-who-the-tenth-doctor-archives-7-the-forgott/4000-489591/
ComicInfo.Title: The Forgotten Part 1: Amputation
